ygData.subject: Alliance VS Maximals
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey, people have been emailing me about the whole Cheetor thing (Jason and Earth both having Cheetor), and its really starting to piss me off. So, if Jason and

Date: Sun, 17 Sep 2000 22:46:48 EDT
Subject: Alliance VS Maximals
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: AOL 4.0 for Windows 95 sub 107
From: Yanshosh@...

Hey, people have been emailing me about the whole Cheetor thing (Jason and 
Earth both having Cheetor), and its really starting to piss me off. So, if 
Jason and Earth would be so kind as to talk this over with each other 
PEACEFULLY, it'd take a great deal off of everyone else's shoulders. But 
remember, Earth did have Cheetor first.

::The Oblitercons/Firearm/Grimmler/Proto/Prowl/Rex::

Shots pummel Dark One's jet armor, one of them hitting into one of his guns, 
a small explosion sending him spinning sideways. He transforms into robot 
mode, growling as he fires mroe shots at Dinobot.

He was going to kill these two Maximals, and nothing was going to stop him.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The forest around Pyro catches on fire as shots from his cannon hit the 
trees, the pyromaniac getting closer to the two Maximals. His sensors show 
Hiss flying, in gun mode, firing at Tavatron, the other Oblitercons running 
behind.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
As final preporation for the rescue mission, Firearm glances at the scanners 
of the Cybertronian Fire, his eyes widening as he sees gunfire near the 
location where Dinobot and Tavatron were last detected. The big Maximal jumps 
to his feet, activating his comm to all Maximals.

"All Maximals, two units are under attack near the Alliance base," he says 
into it, running out of the room and heading for the exit, "Proto, 
Necromancer, Grimmler, Prowl, HotRod, come with me, we're gonna show those 
Alliance bots what messing with Maximals feels like! Anyone else that feels 
like it can also come. Rex, ya busy?"

"Brig duty," Rex's voice replies, a bit depressed.

"Aw..." Firearm says, "You're gonna have to sit this one out, buddy! Everyone 
else, report to the entrance hatch as fast as you can, I'm not waiting for 
more than a few seconds! Let's go!!! If I'm not at the hatch, it means I 
left, just follow my signature. I'll leave an exaust trail."

Firearm runs out of the CF, nearly tripping over himself as he motions for 
Necromancer to follow him, waits half a second, and flies off at top speed 
for the Alliance territory, his jetpack leaving a trail of exaust.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Prowl nods at HotRod, grinning even though he was supposed to be jealous.

"Nice to meet you, Pr-" he shuts up as Firearm's voice sounds on his comm, 
and across the ship's intercom. He looks at Hot Rod and Prowler. "Let's go 
guys, I think Prowler should go to, for his first mission."

He looks at Iron Raptor. "I'll see you later, love," he says, spinning around 
and running toward the exit of the Cybertronian Fire, not seeing Cheetor walk 
up.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Grimmler stops as he recieves Firearm's orders. He looks at Foxfingers, 
shrugging.

"You heard 'im, let's go!" he says, grabbing Foxfingers by the shoulder and 
running off toward the exit, tugging him along.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Proto spins around as Firearm rushes out of the CF and takes off, smiling. 
Just like Firearm, taking off like that.

His feet boosters activating, Proto quickly catches up to Firearm.

"Just like old times, eh, Arm?" he says, flying beside the bot.

Firearm nods, grinning and speeding up. "Let's show these bots what Maximals 
are made of, and I don't mean by being gutted!"
